doc.title: Dice roll history endpoint
doc.description: Bring the dice activity of any room into your own tools by calling the read-only dice rolls endpoint below.
doc.endpointHelp: Returns only dice messages for the selected room. Combine it with your API key whenever the request does not originate from rolz.asmotym.fr.
doc.authDescription: Send the API key you generated above in the X-API-Key header and request JSON responses with Accept: application/json.
doc.pathRoomIdDescription: Identifier of the room you want to inspect. You can copy it from the room URL or from previous API responses.
doc.queryLimitDescription: Optional integer that caps how many dice rolls are returned. Defaults to 50 and is limited to 200. Without other filters, results are sorted from newest to oldest.
doc.querySinceDescription: Optional ISO 8601 timestamp (e.g. 2024-01-01T00:00:00Z). When set, only dice rolls created strictly after this moment are returned and they are sorted from oldest to newest.
doc.responseDescription: Responses always follow a success/data structure. The data object echoes the roomId and exposes diceRolls, an array of dice chat messages (id, userId, username, nickname, diceNotation, diceTotal, diceRolls[], createdAt, ...).
doc.roomsDescription: Use this endpoint to fetch every room you created or joined. The payload mirrors what you see in Settings â†’ Rooms.
doc.roomsEndpointHelp: Returns both active and archived rooms linked to the user identified by your API key.
doc.roomsResponseDescription: Responses return success with data.rooms. Each room entry matches the app (id, name, inviteCode, isProtected, memberCount, lastActivity, archivedAt, isArchived, isCreator, createdBy, createdAt).
doc.membersDescription: Use this route to retrieve the full roster of a room you belong to.
doc.membersEndpointHelp: Requires your API key and only works if you are a member of the requested room.
doc.membersResponseDescription: Responses return success plus data.roomId and data.members. Each member contains userId, username, nickname, avatar, joinedAt, lastSeen, and isOnline.
